title: Drawing, "Table, Round", ca. 1934–35
medium: Graphite and green color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink at lower left: DONALD DESKEY/ 501 MADISON AVENUE/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower left: 3; lower right: SCALE 1 1/2"-1'0"/6303 [circled]; lower right margin: X; dimensions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for circular table. Clear glass on top surface, mirrored glass on shelf below. Frame of table in tubular metal; rod support on each side, circular base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Table, Round", ca. 1934–35.
ca. 1934–35. Graphite and green color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1190.
